statements: DELETE FROM loan_transactions WHERE borrower_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM loan_transactions WHERE borrower_name = 'Alice' AND loan_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM loan_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND documentation LIKE '%urgent%';
DELETE FROM documentation WHERE upload_date < '2020-01-01' AND document_type = 'Final Report'
DELETE FROM loan_documents WHERE document_type = 'Agreement' AND document_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM loan_documents WHERE loan_id = 100 AND document_type = 'Agreement';
